text:
@atrupar So @POTUS finds churches as essential as @GovRonDeSantis finds WWE? If you believe in a god who is omniscient & omnipresent then why do you have to pray from a mosque/synagogue/church for “him” to hear? Can’t you stroke his ego & praise him from anywhere?

https://t.co/MB1GDggWxQ
